explains: n. 超越；卓越；超然存在

sentences.en: The Arab-American Society promotes the transcendence of racial and religious differences.
sentences.cn: 阿拉伯裔美国人协会促进了种族和宗教差异的超越。

sentences.en: But it also appears in the literature of transcendence.
sentences.cn: 但也在超验性文学里出现。

sentences.en: But "gnosis" refers to knowledge of God or, to put it another way, transcendence of the subject-object division.
sentences.cn: 但是“灵知主义者”想要追求关于上帝的知识，或者换一种说法，超越主体与客体之间的界限。
